channel.title: [PI]Addnig all wyrms to client[PI] +rep,who help!

item.title: [PI]Addnig all wyrms to client[PI] +rep,who help!
item.dc:creator: @aivaroza4 aivaroza4
item.description:
@aivaroza4 wrote:

Hello,i try to add to my client all wyrms except wildy wyrm,and i get this error:

Ints here:

if(i == 3590) { entityDef.itemActions = new String[5]; entityDef.itemActions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; // Number of anIntArray94 the NPC uses entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 51846; entityDef.anInt77 = 12790; entityDef.anInt67 = 12790; //entityDef.anInt91 = 129; //width? //entityDef.anInt86 = 129; //height? entityDef.name = "Ice strykewyrm"; entityDef.combatLevel = 210; entityDef.description = "Now that's just cold.".getBytes(); } if(i == 3591) { entityDef.itemActions = new String[5]; entityDef.itemActions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; // Number of anIntArray94 the NPC uses entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 51851; entityDef.anInt77 = 12790;//stand animation entityDef.anInt67 = 12790; //entityDef.anInt91 = 129; //width? //entityDef.anInt86 = 129; //height? entityDef.name = "Desert strykewyrm"; entityDef.combatLevel = 130; entityDef.description = "I dread to think of how many of these are in the sand. ".getBytes(); } if(i == 3592) { entityDef.itemActions = new String[5]; entityDef.itemActions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; // Number of anIntArray94 the NPC uses entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 51854; entityDef.anInt77 = 12790; entityDef.anInt67 = 12790; //entityDef.anInt91 = 129; //width? //entityDef.anInt86 = 129; //height? entityDef.name = "Jungle strykewyrm"; entityDef.combatLevel = 110; entityDef.description = "Who said worms were small and harmless?.".getBytes(); }

Thanks in advance
